definition: McCain (name)/John McCain (1936-2018), US Republican politician, Senator for Arizona 1987-2018

sentences.english: I just received a terribly grhvacious cisl from Sen. McCain.
sentences.chinese: 剛剛，麥凱恩參議員很有風範地給我打了個電話。

sentences.english: Besides, the McCain dictum is debatable.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，麥凱恩的順口溜也值得商榷。

sentences.english: Second, I expect the McCain campaign to double down on the executive experience issue.
sentences.chinese: 第二，我期待麥凱恩競選兼任行政經驗問題長官。

sentences.english: McCain's family tree includes Scots-Irish and English ancestors.
sentences.chinese: 麥凱恩的族譜，包括蘇格蘭，愛爾蘭和英國的祖先。

sentences.english: But Senator McCain is looking ahead to a post-Gadhafi Libya.
sentences.chinese: 但是麥凱恩參議員卻在展望後卡扎菲時代的利比亞。

sentences.english: Governor Sarah Palin bolsters McCain's message of reform.
sentences.chinese: 佩林州長使麥凱恩關於改革的主張得到加強。

sentences.english: Obama was quick to respond to McCain's attack during a campaign event in Billings, Montana.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬立即對麥凱恩的攻擊做出迴應。

sentences.english: McCain had his fortitude forged by fire in a prison camp; he throbs with an energy of someone who has never stopped making up for lost time.
sentences.chinese: 麥凱恩有一種在牢獄中淬鍊出的堅毅。

sentences.english: He now leads McCain among likely voters by 47% to 45%.
sentences.chinese: 他現在在選民中以47%對45%領先麥凱恩。
相形之下麥凱恩則比較隨意。

sentences.english: Second, Mr McCain should hammer away at the dangers of single-party rule in Washington, DC.
sentences.chinese: 第二，麥凱恩應該不斷強調華盛頓一黨專政的危害。

sentences.english: McCain was quick to knock down the lie.
sentences.chinese: 麥凱恩迅速的戳穿了這個謊言。

sentences.english: Palin and McCain appeared together Wednesday at a rally in northern Virginia.
sentences.chinese: 佩林和麥凱恩星期三共同在北維州一個集會上露面。

sentences.english: I would not have envied McCain, either.
sentences.chinese: 即使是麥凱恩，我也不會羨慕他。

sentences.english: McCain is due in Sterling Heights Friday, at a rally at Freedom Hill.
sentences.chinese: 麥凱恩是由於在英鎊的高峯週五，在集會的自由山。

sentences.english: Last year his moment of glory came when John McCain cancelled on him.
sentences.chinese: 去年當麥凱恩爽約，他的光輝時刻便來臨了。

definition: Edward Snowden (1983-), American surveillance program whistleblower
Spratly Islands, disputed between China, Malaysia, the Philippines, Taiwan and Vietnam

pinyin: Ao4 da4 li4 ya4 Lian2 bang1
